issue.title: [R] Release News
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16276](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16276). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I typically use a command like:

```Java

git log fcab481 --grep=".*\[R\].*" --format="%s"
```

Which will find all the commits with `[R]`, since commit fcab481. I found commit fcab481 by going to the 7.0.0 release branch and then finding the last commit that is in the master branch as well as the 7.0.0 release.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16276?focusedCommentId=17528383) by Will Jones (willjones127):*
I think that command is changed up until that commit. Changes after that commit seems to be:

```bash

git log fcab481..HEAD --grep=".*\[R\].*" --format="%s" > r-changes.txt
```

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16276?focusedCommentId=17531376) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13005
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13005>
